task: Design and implement a community-driven renewable energy project in Southeast Asia: 1. Identify and assess potential renewable energy sites, 2. Develop a scalable implementation plan involving local communities, 3. Establish educational programs for skill development in renewable technologies, 4. Secure necessary funding and investment in collaboration with financial institutions, 5. Create a monitoring system to track project impact, 6. Build a communication strategy for community engagement and awareness.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates the agents to complete the task.

agents.name: project_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees the entire renewable energy project, ensuring all tasks are completed efficiently and sustainably.

agents.name: site_assessment_agent
agents.role: Assesses various sites for their potential to support renewable energy projects.

agents.name: site_survey_agent
agents.role: Conducts on-ground surveys to evaluate site suitability for energy generation.

agents.name: renewable_resource_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes resource availability and potential productivity of proposed sites.

agents.name: governmental_permission_agent
agents.role: Secures governmental permissions and checks compliance with local regulations.

agents.name: local_regulation_agent
agents.role: Expert on local regulations affecting renewable energy projects.

agents.name: community_engagement_agent
agents.role: Facilitates engagement with local communities to ensure their involvement and address cultural considerations.

agents.name: local_community_leader_agent
agents.role: Interfaces with community leaders to garner support and involvement.

agents.name: cultural_liaison_agent
agents.role: Advises on cultural norms and sensitivities, facilitating respectful integration.

agents.name: awareness_campaign_agent
agents.role: Develops campaigns to raise awareness and garner support for the project.

agents.name: education_program_agent
agents.role: Develops and implements educational initiatives to build local capacity in renewable technologies.

agents.name: training_material_developer_agent
agents.role: Creates training materials tailored to developing skills in renewable energy technologies.

agents.name: renewable_technology_specialist_agent
agents.role: Provides expertise on cutting-edge sustainable technologies.

agents.name: local_education_institution_agent
agents.role: Collaborates with local institutions to customize training curricula.

agents.name: curriculum_customization_agent
agents.role: Aligns educational programs to local needs and capabilities.

agents.name: funding_acquisition_agent
agents.role: Secures financial backing and investment for the project.

agents.name: financial_analysis_agent
agents.role: Performs financial analysis to structure viable investment opportunities.

agents.name: investment_partner_engagement_agent
agents.role: Builds partnerships with potential investors and funding bodies.

agents.name: monitoring_system_agent
agents.role: Develops systems to track and report on the project's impact over time.

agents.name: data_collection_agent
agents.role: Collects data critical to evaluating project success and areas for improvement.

agents.name: impact_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes collected data to measure project outcomes and inform future strategies.

agents.name: communication_strategy_agent
agents.role: Creators of communication strategies to keep stakeholders informed and engaged.

agents.name: media_specialist_agent
agents.role: Specializes in crafting media for different platforms to effectively communicate project goals.

agents.name: campaign_development_agent
agents.role: Designs specific campaigns to communicate project progress and benefits.

tools.name: site_evaluation_tool
tools.description: Evaluates potential sites based on environmental and logistical criteria.

resource_types.description: Types of renewable resources available to analyze, e.g., solar, wind, hydro.

tools.name: community_feedback_tool
tools.description: Gathers and manages feedback from community stakeholders.

community_id.description: Identifier for the community involved in the project.

feedback_type.description: Type of feedback being collected, e.g., support, concerns, suggestions.

anonymous_submission.description: Allow anonymous submissions to encourage honest feedback.
